trans-unit.source: Implements a custom persistence format for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 實作自訂持續性格式<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET server controls can implement customized persistence formats by using their own control builder.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 伺服器控制項可以使用自己的控制項產生器，以實作自訂持續性格式。

trans-unit.source: This is done by creating a control builder class and adding a control builder attribute to the class.
trans-unit.target: 這是藉由建立控制項產生器類別，並將控制項產生器屬性加入至類別。

trans-unit.source: Control builder objects are used when the page is parsed and compiled.
trans-unit.target: 剖析和編譯的頁面時，會使用控制項產生器物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Implementing Custom Persistence](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ac8e85a9-422e-49b8-98c0-5ade5853ea7c).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[實作自訂持續性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ac8e85a9-422e-49b8-98c0-5ade5853ea7c)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceControlBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceControlBuilder"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified literal content to a control.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的常值內容加入至控制項。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The literal content to add to a control.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至控制項的常值內容。

trans-unit.source: Adds builders to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref> object for any child controls that belong to the container control.
trans-unit.target: 將產生器加入<xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref>屬於容器控制項的任何子控制項的物件。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Obtains the type for the control's child controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的子控制項類型。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name of the tag.
trans-unit.target: 表示標記的名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>物件。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: 無。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the server control is initialized, which is the first step in its life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 發生於初始化伺服器控制項時，這是在其生命週期的第一個步驟。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework during parsing and is not intended to be called directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法在剖析期間由 ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫，並不是直接在您的程式碼中呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The template parser object responsible for parsing the control.
trans-unit.target: 負責剖析控制項的範本剖析器物件。

trans-unit.source: The control builder object responsible for building the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 負責建立父控制項的控制項產生器物件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref> is not a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificControlBuilder"></xref> object, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref>不<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificControlBuilder"></xref>物件時，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The type that is assigned to the control that the builder will create.
trans-unit.target: 指派給產生器會建立控制項類型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the tag to be built.
trans-unit.target: 要建置的標記名稱。

trans-unit.source: This enables the builder to support multiple tag types.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓以支援多個標記類型產生器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ID*> attribute that is assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ID*>指派給控制項的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ID*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object that holds the specified tag attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>保留指定的標記屬性的物件。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: parentBuilder is not a object.
trans-unit.target: parentBuilder不是物件。
